name: Community Support Connections - Caregiver Support
comment:
Virtual and in-person support groups for caregivers of older adults and adults with different abilities * groups are an opportunity for people to discuss the joys and challenges of care-giving with other caregivers * discussions include effective communication, self-care, and navigating the health care system

One-to-one support also available

description_of_this:
Virtual and in-person support groups for caregivers of older adults and adults with different abilities * groups are an opportunity for people to discuss the joys and challenges of care-giving with other caregivers * discussions include effective communication, self-care, and navigating the health care system

One-to-one support also available, Codes: Free, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Referral: Call for more information and to register, Address: 61 Woolwich St N, Box 29, Breslau, ON, N0B 1M0, Location: lat: 43.4851, lon: -80.4156, Contact: phone: 519-772-8787 ext 136, fax: 519-648-3737, email: info@cscmow.org, url: www.communitysupportconnections.org/services/caregiver-support/
